name: Marabou
run: vehicle compile -s simple-vector.vcl -t Marabou -o simple-vector.inputquery/ --network f:NO_FILE

name: Agda
run: vehicle compile -s simple-vector.vcl -t Agda -o simple-vector.agda --network f:NO_FILE

name: LossFunction
run: vehicle compile -s simple-vector.vcl -t LossFunction -o simple-vector.loss.json --network f:NO_FILE
